name: Marisphere Gaiden: Tempest & Geno
description:
Follow Tempest and Geno as they storm the castle in this side-story to Marisphere 2! Please do note that this is a small game, something put together to bridge the gap between Marisphere 3 and Marisphere 2.

Be sure to follow me on Twitter and join my Discord for more games!

@LNThracia776

https://discord.gg/QdN8qxz

(Geno belongs to Square, Mario belongs to Nintendo, and the music played, Soulless 4, belongs to user ExileLord on Youtube. Please support their future work.)
